protocol.name: P-GSE34837-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-2
protocol.text: T3 seeds were stratified on plate for 72 h in the dark at 4°C and then transferred to 22°C with a 16-h light (100 μE m−2 s−1)/8-h dark period.

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with the Plant RNAeasy kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-4
protocol.text: RNA was labelled with the MessageAMP II biotin enhanced (Ambion) kit according to the manufactures protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-5
protocol.text: Hybridizations against Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (GeneChip System®, Affymetrix) chips were performed at 45 °C for 16 h, in the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation (hybridization oven 640, Fluidics Station 450), using 10 µg of Biotin-labeled aRNA, according to the manufacturer's protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned by use of the Affymetrix GeneChip Workstation Scanner 3000.

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-7
protocol.text: Expression values are calculated based on the difference of the PM signal and MM signal at each of the probe pairs using the Affymetrix GeneChip Operating System (GCOS). Present, Marginal or Absent (P/M/A) calls were computed with the affy package. This software employs statistical algorithms to calculate qualitative and quantitative expression values for each transcript. It also generates a statistical p-value, which suggests the level of confidence in each of the qualitative measurements.

protocol.name: P-GSE34837-8
protocol.text: For estradiol (EST) treatment, 14 day-old seedlings were selected and synchronized in ½ MS liquid medium in long-day condition for one night. Subsequently, fresh medium with 10 μM EST was added to the seedlings in a 12-well plate and the same amount of inducer-free medium to control samples as a mock treatment. After 2 hours seedlings were harvested and directly frozen in liquid nitrogen.
